summary: This document is a chain of internal emails from July 2023, forwarding an external email from attorney Jeanne M. Christensen. The forwarded email urges a recipient (likely a prosecutor's office) to investigate Leon Black based on new information about a $62.5 million settlement with the US Virgin Islands related to Jeffrey Epstein and allegations from multiple women.

keyFacts: Leon Black paid $62.5 million to the US Virgin Islands in a settlement related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The payment to the USVI is stated to be separate from payments made to individual women.
Attorney Jeanne M. Christensen states she has heard one lawyer represents ten women who allege Leon Black sexually assaulted them.
Christensen expresses outrage that criminal charges have not been brought against Leon Black and urges a prosecutor's office to investigate based on this new information.
The email chain indicates the matter overlaps with the Epstein/Maxwell case.
